PageTitle: Collaborate on office files within your Zoom sessions | ONLYOFFICE
PageDescription: Edit and co-author docs, sheets, slides, forms, and PDF within Zoom using ONLYOFFICE DocSpace
EnableCollaborativeDocumentEditing: Work on office documents right in Zoom using a robust feature set of ONLYOFFICE
CollaborateOfficeDocuments: Collaborate on office documents during Zoom meetings
DocumentsTab1Label: Create, upload and share docs providing Edit or Live view permissions.
DocumentsTab2Label: Co-author docs, sheets, slides in real time with other participants.
DocumentsTab3Label: Discuss and fill out complex online forms, i.e. sales agreements or contracts.
DocumentsTab4Label: Navigate through PDF docs, add comments, annotations, drawings.
DocumentsTab5Label: Store files edited during Zoom meeting within a collaboration room and get constant access to them from anywhere at any time.
EfficientlyManageYourDocuments: Efficiently manage your documents between meetings
ManageTab1Label: Create a secure space for all your docs. Easily access it from your Zoom account.
ManageTab2Label: Organize your personal files and create rooms for your business documents.
ManageTab3Label: Provide flexible access permissions: edit, comment, review, or view only.
ManageTab4Label: Use public rooms to give access to your docs to people outside of your space.
MarketplaceConnectorTitle: Built to work in Zoom seamlessly
MarketplaceConnectorDescription: Install ONLYOFFICE app for Zoom today from the Zoom App Marketplace.
Reason1: A robust set of editing, formatting, and styling tools. <0>Integrated AI helper</0> (ChatGPT or ZhiPu Copilot).
Reason2: <0>Real-time</0> and paragraph-locking co-editing, review, version history, document comparison, comments & mentions.
Reason3: Support for more than <0>50 file formats</0>. Fully compatible with MS Office formats: DOCX, XLSX, PPTX.
Reason4: <0>Enhanced security</0>. Flexible access rights and JWT. Activity tracking and audit reporting. Encryption at rest and in transit. Open source code.
Reason5: <0>Free plan to start</0>. Business plan for more admins, bigger storage, enhanced security and professional support.
HowToStartStep2: Install ONLYOFFICE DocSpace from the <0>Zoom App Marketplace</0> and allow the requested app permissions.
HowToStartStep3: Start a meeting, switch to the Apps tab and launch the ONLYOFFICE DocSpace app.
HowToStartStep4: Initiate a collaboration session by selecting the needed file from the list.
